content:
Yes, Jennifer Lawrence is a talented actress and has been in many great films. Here are some of her other notable movies:

1. The Hunger Games series (2012-2015) - She plays the lead role of Katniss Everdeen in this blockbuster franchise.

2. American Hustle (2013) - She plays Rosalyn Rosenfeld, the unpredictable wife of con-man Irving Rosenfeld, in this crime drama.

3. Joy (2015) - She plays Joy Mangano, the inventor of the Miracle Mop, in this biographical comedy-drama.

4. X-Men: First Class (2011) - She plays Raven Darkholme / Mystique in this superhero film.

5. Winter’s Bone (2010) - This independent drama was Lawrence's breakthrough role as she plays a teenage girl who searches for her missing father in order to save her family's home.

I hope you find these recommendations helpful!
